backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing a dance class booking system with user profiles, class/session management, bookings with Stripe payment integration, video lessons, contact inquiries, and role-based access control (admin/instructor/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping five laser cutting website features (homepage hero, product gallery, about section, contact form, services overview) to their implementation files and components with high confidence test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing a dance class booking application with catalog, bookings, instructor dashboard, video lessons, authentication, and role-based access control components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for a dance classes app with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point for React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component using TanStack Router to define routes for a laser cutting website (home, gallery, about, services, contact) with shared layout including header, footer, theme provider, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Empty file placeholder for access denied screen component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Empty file placeholder for login button component.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty file placeholder for profile setup dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/Registratio: Empty file placeholder for registration form component.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Empty file placeholder for role-based access control gate component.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Empty file placeholder for booking button component.
Empty file placeholder for booking reminder checker component.
Empty file placeholder for booking reminder manager component.
frontend/src/components/classes/ClassEdi: Empty file placeholder for class editor dialog component.
frontend/src/components/instructor/Sessi: Empty file placeholder for session roster panel component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer component for LaserArt Studio website with three columns containing company description, quick navigation links, contact information (location, email, phone), copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component for LaserArt Studio with logo, navigation menu (Home, Gallery, Services, About, Contact), and responsive mobile menu with hamburger toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for managing dance classes, sessions, bookings, and video lessons with CRUD operations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm amber/copper color palette for laser cutting artwork theme, including light and dark mode variants using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/about/AboutPage.tsx: About page showcasing LaserArt Studio's story, laser cutting technology, workshop details, and company values with hero section and image-text layouts.
frontend/src/pages/contact/ContactPage.t: Contact form page that collects name, email, phone, and message from users, validates required fields, and submits inquiries using a mutation hook with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/gallery/GalleryPage.t: Gallery page displaying laser-cut products filtered by category (gifts, decor, industrial) using tabs, with a grid of product cards showing images, titles, descriptions, and category badges.
frontend/src/pages/home/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section showcasing laser cutting services, features section highlighting originality/durability/finishing, and services overview for gifts, décor, and industrial components.
frontend/src/pages/services/ServicesPage: Services page detailing three main offerings (gifting solutions, home décor, industrial components) with feature lists, images, and links to gallery examples.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme with HSL variables, container settings, extended shadows, Inter font family, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a laser cutting artworks business website for the Pune market with features for hero section, product gallery (gifts/décor/industrial), about section, contact form, services overview, and modern visual design. Includes image requirements for hero banners, product showcases, workshop photos, and tracks 7 existing features with their requirement IDs and versions.
